website_summaries.verdict: Fitting a day's worth of meals, this roomy, affordable, and well thought out lunch bag is perfect for those with long work shifts.
pros: There's enough room to fit a lot of food without being too bulky
The bag is good quality, durable, and comes with BPA-free containers
Separate compartments are available for bottles, food containers, and snacks
Handles and a removable shoulder strap allow for easy transport

customer_reviews.title: the receipient loved it. I couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift! the receipient loved it. I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The containers are the only problem!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very well made and very well insulated. It keeps my items cold and fresh for hours on end. The issue is the containers do not follow the same footsteps in the quality department. Upon my first use, one of the containers broke while I was putting on the lid. I hadn't even put it through my dishwasher yet. Be aware that you may have to purchase more meal prep containers to replace the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Behr

customer_reviews.title: Great for eating lunch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch pale, i have been using for about 2 months now and it is holding up very well. My only complaint is i wish the carrying strap had better padding in it. Also i love that it has plenty of room and you can store standard tupper ware containers in it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The 3 separate containers are of excellent quality. This will certainly be utilized everyday and ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made product. I am impressed with the quality of the Meal Prep bag. The 3 separate containers are of excellent quality. This will certainly be utilized everyday and will allow for portion control and packing 3 meals in one well designed bag. The separate drink and snack areas are also well designed for easy access. It is also possible to purchase extra containers to enable one to prep meals in advance. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I like how I can keep the fruit away from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new lunchbox for my husband that had several sepeate compartments and this met that criteria. I like how I can keep the fruit away from the ice packs and meals. Along with the granola snaks. Drinks are separate as well. It can fit quite a bit. I don’t use the tupperware it came with all the time but it’s not bad. Like that it has a strap as well so when he carries multiple things it makes it easier :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I pack meals for two twelve hour days in this bag. I packed the small upper area with hard boiled eggs, baby bell cheese and a small ice pack. I placed two lunches and a tray of fruit in the bigger area along with another icepack. I carried three 12 oz cans of drink in the drink compartment. I rechilled one ice pack overnight. When I got home from work after the second 12 hour shift I still had cool food leftovers. I am very happy with this product. I especially love that it was made in Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great back
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Containers are a little difficult to handle when hot and the "bottle slot" doesn't really hold a 24oz mixer bottle but perfect size for 2 myoplex drinks. Good quality, keeps the food cold, and "thick skinned"
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is all the lunch box I need. I can store 2 shakers, 2 small freezer packs, 2 containers, utensils, etc . I would highly recommend if you're looking for an expensive lunch bag solution. Very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome bag but I was very disappointed with the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bag but I was very disappointed with the quality of the plastic containers. They are very flimsy, much worse than disposable plastic containers. I do not expect them to last very long and it will be difficult to find replacements in the exact size. I would not purchase this again if the plastic containers are not upgraded to a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sisco

customer_reviews.title: the bag and trays are very convenient for my needs ...
customer_reviews.text: the bag and trays are very convenient for my needs. The trays provide the appropriate portion servings. The bags allows the contents of items to maintain freshness. Thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: ohnou2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well made - great for making better lunches for the husband
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Prescott

customer_reviews.title: No fuss front zipper compartment which easy holds 3 meals or 2 meals plus additional room ...
customer_reviews.text: No fuss front zipper compartment which easy holds 3 meals or 2 meals plus additional room for snacks. Top compartment easy has enough space to hold bananas, small apples plus additional snack space. Two large blender bottles are a tight fit in the back compartment. I fit 1 blender bottle and smaller juice, etc with ease. This has been a perfect lunch box replacement for work. Perfect to make sure you hit those macros during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin MUllet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is good but the boxes are not good.
customer_reviews.author: Luong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortably. excellent quality. Capacity great. A good man's color. Thank you for your service. Definitely I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: IC-Texas

customer_reviews.title: Zippers do not hold up
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but the zippers do not hold up. I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for everything I take to work
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for everything I take to work. Not too big and bulky like a lot of other meal prep bags. Materials and feel seems done with quality.
customer_reviews.author: m.randowjr

customer_reviews.title: Works great for when my husband has late nights at work ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for when my husband has late nights at work or training throughout the day/night and has to take 2-3 meals
customer_reviews.author: Byron Yates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing a Whole30 this month and this is the perfect bag. It's not cumbersome and it holds my food for the day perfectly well!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Weist

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Everything I need to maintain a healthy diet fits in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jimenezl8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box is grea I love the many compartments. And it stays cool through a whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! The quality is really good! Plenty of room for food and all your other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Remielyn Manding

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied. The size is just right
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied. The size is just right. Awesome compartments ,and the material seems very strong. I like the cross body strap too. My wife and I thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff with lot of room for different type of containers. Quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Sai Rajesh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - perfect for Meal Preppers
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's perfect for my meal preps and has plenty of storage for extra goodies such as vitamins, protein powder, pre-workout, etc. great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Frees up my hands without a dude having to buy a purse for all my stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so handy for a guy like me. Before purchasing this bag, I would walk to work from my car with no free hands. In one hand, i'd have both my coffee and my hydroflask, and on the other, my lunch for the day in a bag and my phone. My pockets already had a few things and I still needed to open the door with a key. I was always fumbling around. Once I purchased this, everything freed up and I was able to move around pretty easily. Though it was much bigger than I thought, I actually appreciate that as it can hold everything without being called a purse ;)
customer_reviews.author: JAMIxSON

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag is smaller than I imagined it would be.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: I have had many lunch containers in the past. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many lunch containers in the past. But this is the first time I found that meets all my needs. You are five stars to me. Thank you. Frank
customer_reviews.author: Belle Mcl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, perfect for all my meals for the day!
customer_reviews.author: rosa gallegos

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bag. Just not as big as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag. Just not as big as I thought it would be. Can only fit two of the meal containers and one ice pack. I have to stuff my other containers in the other pockets. If it was bigger, I would be totally happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. There is enough space for my meals and snacks and everything fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For On-The-Go Professionals
customer_reviews.text: I recently started packing my meals for the entire day and this thing is awesome. Containers stack perfectly in the main compartment, and there's room for drinks in the back, and whatever else you need on the top. It is also small enough to fit just about anywhere. I highly recommend this product if you are gone all day and want to save money instead of eating out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: This bag is wonderful. Well made and plenty of places to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his lunch for work. He often works late and needs to pack quite a bit because dietary restrictions make it hard to just buy food out. This bag is wonderful. Well made and plenty of places to put all his meals snacks and drinks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: For serious lunches
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a guy, and it was well received. Definitely a serious lunch bag with lots of room. Does not collapse so make sure you have the space in your fridge for it. Or just use icepacks!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMA

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, big enough for a 12 hour shift of food.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. I a new to the Meal Prep thing but this allows me to take a whole 12 hour shift worth of food with our looking like i'm carrying a gigantic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Barnes

customer_reviews.title: My husband dosent like to use them
customer_reviews.text: The tubs that come with it are a little cheap. My husband dosent like to use them. But in all its a great lunch box. Lots of space and extra pockets to carry essentials into a factory.
customer_reviews.author: brandon gilkerson

customer_reviews.title: It's chill.  :b
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty neat. Keeps my food cool throughout most of the day without needing a fridge. Lots of space for breakfast and lunch for those that take both from home.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Dyachuk

customer_reviews.title: Nice and not cheap looking like some other bags I had!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! Definitely the right size for what I need and also right price! Hope the lining will hold up but some wear and tear I'm sure will happen by where the zipper runs.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Danilov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, it has plenty of room and is easy to carry around. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Lunch bag works great. Fits everything I need for the day
customer_reviews.text: Lunch bag works great. Fits everything I need for the day. The only problem is that after a week the strap broke. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Riley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag has lots of space for what I need and fits my meal prep contanier
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Super large to fit a ton of food.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag to store your meals for the day! Perfect size...not too big, and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
